name: "The Dresden Files" - "Rules of Engagement" Online Trivia | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What relationship was Harry's client to the person who was wronged?
questions.explanation:
Niece.

	Nikki hired Dresden to chase down her aunt's deadbeat boyfriend who had run off with her money.

questions.correct: Enforcers of law for the supernatural
questions.explanation:
Enforcers of law for the supernatural.

	The head of the Chicago branch of the High Council was Morgan. Morgan was played by Conrad Coates. He showed up to investigate when a man Dresden was searching for was found dead.

questions.text: How was the man Dresden was searching for found dead?
questions.explanation:
Burnt.

	The man had stolen $22,000 from his client's aunt. While Dresden knew her as Nikki, her real name was Caryn Harris.

Det. Sid Kirmani

	Kirmani was played by Raoul Bhaneja. He had also been in "The Sentinel", "At the Hotel", and several animated projects as a voice actor. The character was created for the series, he never appeared in the book series.

questions.text: Why didn't Dresden tell Murphy about the supernatural?
questions.correct: There are rules against revealing the magical world to non-magical people.
options: The High Council ordered the death of mortals who knew.
questions.explanation:
There are rules against revealing the magical world to non-magical people.

	The High Council had rules that said if you didn't already know about the supernatural you couldn't be told. It wasn't explained exactly how they managed to keep the happenings secret though.

questions.text: What did Dresden call the evil beings in the episode?
questions.explanation:
Hellions.

	Kim Coates played Sirocha, who was this series' form of Evil Incarnate. He referred to all of the evil beings as Hellions. Sirocha also referred to them as such when he talked to Dresden about them. In previous episodes they were called demons.

questions.text: Dresden was fired by Caryn after she was arrested.
questions.explanation:
True.

	He convinced Murphy to let him talk to her privately. During that conversation in the interrogation room they had an argument and he was fired. Caryn was later kidnapped out of police custody.

questions.text: What item did each demon have that allowed Sirocha to control it?
questions.explanation:
Chain.

	The chain was called the Chain of Sin, it allowed Sirocha, or whoever held it to control the Hellion. If a Hellion ever got his or her own chain they could be free to do whatever they pleased with no one controlling them.

Matthew.

	He was a Hellion, and Dresden kept trying to save her from him. She didn't want saving though, instead she attacked Dresden and fled with Matthew.

questions.text: Dresden killed Matthew in the end.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Instead he managed to help Matthew become mortal and escape the ways of evil. They performed a transformation ceremony and destroyed his Chain of Sin.
